title: reference request - Conditions on a Quillen functor so that its comonad is homotopy-full
body: I am looking for an answer to the following question: Let $F : {\cal C} \to {\cal D}$ be a left Quillen functor between combinatorial model categories; let $\tilde F \dashv \tilde G$ be the induced adjunction between the homotopy categories. Which assumptions[1] on $F$ ensure that the comonad $\tilde F\tilde G : {\sf Ho}({\cal D})\to {\sf Ho}({\cal D})$ is a full functor? [1] I already know that $F=1$ works. :-) reference-request ct.category-theory model-categories Share Cite Improve this question Follow edited Jun 15, 2020 at 7:27 Community Bot 1 2 2 silver badges 3 3 bronze badges asked Mar 18, 2017 at 14:59 fosco 14.2k 2 2 gold badges 32 32 silver badges 87 87 bronze badges $\endgroup$ 0 Add a comment  |  0 Sorted by: Reset to default Highest score (default) Date modified (newest first) Date created (oldest first) You must log in to answer this question.
